DOC.brief_summary: The user performance evaluation show whether people diabetes able obtain accurate measurement result blood glucose monitoring system . In study , user performance evaluation perform Contour Plus ( Bayer Healthcare Diabetes Care ) , Accu-Chek Active ( Roche Diagnostics ) , Accu-Chek Performa ( Roche Diagnostics ) OneTouch Select Simple ( LifeScan ) follow ISO 15197:2013 , clause 8 . The study perform 2 part . Each part comprise test 2 BGMS . For BGMS , measurement procedure user performance evaluation perform 1 test meter 1 reagent system lot study subject . The meter additional test meter use double measurement perform study personnel ( reagent system lot use subject ) .
DOC.brief_title: User Performance Evaluation Contour Plus , Accu-Chek Active , Accu-Chek Performa OneTouch Select Simple Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems Following ISO 15197:2013
